name: Brink Of Extinction (itch)
description:
Third year team project, in which the team was tasked with remaking a Golden Age arcade game for the web.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse- Aim/Turn (note that there is vertical inversion)

Left mouse/space - Fire

Right mouse/C - Capture

Escape - Pause

CREDITS:

Eric Bergner - Ship model, Human Models, story, UI sprites

Matthew Harris - Character Control, World Generation

Oliver Lancashire - UI programming, UI design, Accessibility

Aidan McHugh - AI, Dynamic Difficulty Adjustment

Tomas Pribyl - World models, Hangar model

SPECIAL THANKS:

Louis Debenham - Music
